name: FileLink Test Shortcut
summary: A TFL file is a shortcut file created by FileLink, a plug-in for Welch Allyn CardioPerfect Workstation. It is linked to a CardioPerfect Workstation test. Opening or double-clicking the TFL file opens the test to which it points in CardioPerfect Workstation.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Welch Allyn CardioPerfect Workstation with FileLink plug-in installed
